title: SWAP URF WITH PRO KING SO URF IS NEXT WEEK pls rito
body: since we missed urf on april fools they should make it a bit sooner and put urf next week instead of 2 weeks later caseu we all miss urf and want it soon as possible pls riot make urf next week

replies.body: Not the slightest related to Player Behavior or Moderation.
they have to test the new champs in urf to make sure they don't f it up. also riot probably wants to save the urf hype for pax east cause right now they share that weekend.

Cant wait for {{champion:99}}  URF
TASTE THE RAINBOW MOTHERFUCKER 
Lmfao

You are going to be getting multiple weekends of URF over this year.
